summary: Updated the tutor role descriptions in both index.html (role-overlay) and tutor.html (role-subtitle). Changed the descriptions to mention both EduVibe Academy (Mathematics and Physical Science for Grade 10) and Acornhoek Institute for Science and Technology (preparing Grade 11 learners for matric). The descriptions now accurately reflect Bright's tutoring experience at both institutions.
current_status: Tutor role descriptions updated in both index.html and tutor.html to accurately reflect tutoring work at both EduVibe Academy and Acornhoek Institute for Science and Technology. The descriptions now provide a comprehensive overview of Bright's tutoring experience.
